search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Proposify (proposify.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Proposify is: [https://proposify.com/pricing](https://proposify.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

extracted_content.content:
Proposify Pricing
===============

This website uses cookies that are stored in your browser. These cookies are used to collect information about how you interact with our website and allow us to remember you. We use this information in order to improve and customize your browsing experience and for analytics and metrics about our visitors both on this website and other media. To find out more about the cookies we use, see our Privacy Policy

If you decline, your information won’t be tracked when you visit this website. A single cookie will be used in your browser to remember your preference not to be tracked.

Professional Proposals for Every Budget.
========================================

Proposify offers pricing that scales with your business, from solo entrepreneurs to large enterprises. Get started today with a free trial—no credit card required.

Monthly

Up to 4 months free

### Basic

$ 29 /mo

$ 19 /mo

### Kick-start your sales

Send on-brand proposals quickly and close deals.

**Key features include:**

*   Up to 2 users
*   Content library
*   E-signatures & payments
*   Activity and metrics

[Start free trial](https://app.proposify.com/register)

$19 per user/mo, billed annually

Security
--------

Here at Proposify, we understand how critical it is to protect your data and documents. Our team is dedicated to keeping them safe through continuous compliance efforts, ongoing audits, and 24/7 system monitoring to ensure we meet and exceed industry standards.

            ![Image 16](https://www.proposify.com/hubfs/assets/images/badges/security/gdpr.png)

### GDPR

Proposify is committed to protecting our client’s data and privacy. That is why we maintain our GDPR compliance and enable our customers to set their own compliance preferences as a controller.

            ![Image 17](https://www.proposify.com/hubfs/assets/images/badges/security/soc2.png)

### SOC2

Proposify is SOC2 Type 2 certified to reflect our long-standing commitment to security. We have been audited against the [AICPA](https://www.aicpa.org/) Trust Services Criteria for Security, Availability, and Confidentiality.

            ![Image 18](https://www.proposify.com/hubfs/assets/images/badges/security/pcidss.png)

### PCI-DSS

Proposify uses Stripe to process payments. Stripe has been audited by a PCI-certified auditor and is certified to PCI Service Provider Level 1. This is the most rigorous level of certification available in the industry.

Our customers love us!
----------------------

            ![Image 19: G2 2025 Winter - Enterprise - Leader](https://www.proposify.com/hubfs/Leader_Enterprise_Leader.png)

Close more deals, even while you are asleep with Proposify

I love that we are alerted when the prospect interacts with the quote. We get to see how long they have viewed the quote, which page they are currently viewing, if they have clicked on any elements and also a nice E-mail alert when they first open the quote and if they have successfully accepted the quote. We have closed hundreds of sales outside of business hours because of the simplicity for the customer to edit their quote, accept it and then pay for it immediately.

  ![Image 22:  Craig M.](https://www.proposify.com/hubfs/Testimonials/craig.webp)

Craig M. Chief Operating Officer

Ridiculously Useful Proposal Builder

It's simple to create a new proposal from a template and customize it as necessary. Proposals look beautiful from the client's perspective, and they are more effective than any of the other solutions I've tried. I have been using it for a few years now and would not consider using anuything else. We can produce proposals that used to takes us 2 hours in about 15 minutes. And they close at a higher rate.

Frequently asked questions
--------------------------

Have another question not mentioned here? Chat with us below.

Can I cancel my account?

Absolutely! You can cancel your account at any point during your billing cycle to prevent future renewals. Rest assured, you'll continue to enjoy access to all of Proposify's features until the end of your current subscription period. Please note that we do not offer refunds once the payment has been processed.

How do I get access to additional features and services?

You can upgrade your plan at any time to access additional features.

If you are interested in the premium features and services listed on our Business plan, [please get in touch](https://www.proposify.com/demo), and we can set up the right plan for you.

What is included in the free trial?

Our free trial gives you access to all of the features on our [Team plan](https://proposify.com/pricing) for 14 days. We recommend taking things for a spin to see which ones work best for your team and process. You can create and send real proposals to real clients during your trial. Once your trial is over, your clients can still view and accept any proposals you sent to them during the trial period.

What happens when I am at my send limit?

Some of our plans limit how many documents you can send each month.

Once you are at your send limit you can send an additional document for a low one-time fee per send.

The amount of sends will roll over each month so they will accumulate if you don't use them.

How many contacts can I have?

All plans include unlimited contacts. You can import your contacts directly via one of our CRM integrations.

We need to get our documents set up quickly and need a fresh take on the design. Does Proposify offer support?

We certainly do! If you are looking to elevate your deal design and get a more customized look and feel, we are here to help. We have a team of talented and experienced designers in-house to support our customers and ensure they are set up for success. They know proposals and how to make your documents shine through design and work for your unique sales process. Check out our [Professional Services](https://www.proposify.com/professional-services) page for more information and let us transform your proposals so you can be ready to impress.

You don't have a template specific to my industry. Can I create one or can Proposify design one for me?

Absolutely! While we have an extensive [proposal template](https://www.proposify.com/proposal-templates) library for most projects and industries, all our templates are 100% customizable. This means you can create and update the content to match your brand and style guidelines. You can also paste text from other programs like Google Docs and Word for an easy transition.

However, if you have a specific template you are currently using and don’t have the time to get things set up, our team of in-house designers can help. Check out our [Professional Services page](https://www.proposify.com/platform/professional-design-services) for more information.

What are your support hours?

Our team is here to provide their fabulous support Monday - Thursday 8 AM - 8 PM EST and on Fridays 8 AM - 4 PM EST.

Will my proposal data be safe?

Keeping your data safe is a priority. We are dedicated to doing this through continued compliance efforts, ongoing audits, and 24/7 system monitoring to ensure we meet and exceed industry standards. Proposals are sent using secure encrypted links and we never disclose your information to third parties. We partner with Amazon for cloud hosting and your data is protected by 256-bit SSL security. We are also GDPR and SOC2 compliant. Learn more on our [Security](https://www.proposify.com/security) page.

What if my prospects don't speak English?

You can translate our interface into 15 languages to make it easier for your non-English speaking clients. However, we do not translate the content of your proposals or the emails sent through Proposify so you will need to make those adjustments.

### Basic

[Start free trial](https://app.proposify.com/register) | 

### Team

[Start free trial](https://app.proposify.com/register) | 

### Business

[Book a demo](https://www-proposify-com.sandbox.hs-sites.com/demo) |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 

Brand customization
-------------------

 |  |  |  |
| 

Unlimited templates

All accounts allow unlimited templates.





 |  |  |  |
| 

Content library

Create and share templates, sections, and images that can be pulled into documents.





 |  |  |  |
| 

Embed images & videos

Images can be uploaded directly, videos can be embedded from external sources like YouTube, Vidyard, and Wistia





 |  |  |  |
| 

Custom domain

You can map your domain so prospects visit something like proposals.yourdomain.com and don't see "proposify" in the URL





 |  |  |  |
| 

Content authoring
-----------------

 | Basic | Team | Business |
| 

Online signatures

All plans allow you to get documents legally e-signed





 |  |  |  |
| 

Interactive quoting

Allow prospects to alter the quantity or optional add-ons





 |  |  |  |
| 

Client input forms

Capture information from prospects by adding form inputs to your documents.





 |  |  |  |
| 

Document Sends

You can create unlimited documents but some plans limit how many you can send per month.





 | **5 sends per month**  
$1.99 per additional send

 | **Unlimited sending**

 | **Unlimited sending**

 |
| 

Collaborator seats

Collaborators are users who only have access to specific proposals, and can edit or approve, but not create or send.





 | **1 collaborator included**  
$8.00 per additional seat

 | **3 collaborators included**  
$8.00 per additional seat

 | **5 collaborators included**  
$8.00 per additional seat

 |
| 

Visibility
----------

 | Basic | Team | Business |
| 

Notifications & metrics

Get notified by email and see when prospects are viewing your document.





 |  |  |  |
| 

PDF export

Generate a PDF from any document that matches the digital version.





 |  |  |  |
| 

Reports

Get a full exportable table of all your documents with filtering.





 |  |  |  |
| 

Process & control
-----------------

 | Basic | Team | Business |
| 

Payments

Connect your Stripe account and get paid in full or partially when your proposal gets signed.





 |  |  |  |
| 

Automations

Set up automations using pre-built connectors or customize using the workflow builder





 |  |  |  |
| 

Custom fields & variables

Create your own fields you can use internally that get replaced in custom variables within a document.





 |  |  |  |
| 

Integrations

All integrations except for Salesforce.





 |  |  |  |
| 

Auto reminders

You can automatically remind prospects who haven't yet opened your document in daily intervals.





 |  |  |  |
| 

Roles & permissions

Lock down what users can and can't do by role. Pages and individual page elements can be locked.





 |  |  |  |
| 

Approval workflows

Create conditions that if met will trigger an approval from a manager (by deal size and discount size).





 |  |  |  |
| 

Salesforce integration

Use our managed package and optionally SSO so reps work right within Salesforce





 |  |  |  |
| 

Single sign-on (SSO)

Our SSO works with identity providers like Salesforce, Okta, and Azure





 |  |  |  |
| 

Workspaces

Great for multi-unit businesses like franchises. Enables businesses to have completely separate instances that admins can manage.





 |  |  |  |
| 

API Access

Integrate with external systems, or enhance customization, our API provides the tools you need to succeed.





 |  |  |  |
| 

Success
-------

 | Basic | Team | Business |
| 

Email & chat support

Our team is here to provide their fabulous support Monday - Thursday 8 AM - 8 PM EST and on Fridays 8 AM - 4 PM EST.





 |  |  |  |
| 

Phone & Zoom support

Sometimes the written word isn't enough and our team will hop on a call to show you how to accomplish something in Proposify.





 |  |  |  |
| 

Success manager

Your own dedicated CSM who will onboard you and meet with you periodically to ensure you're getting maximum value from Proposify.





 |  |  |  |
| 

Premium integration support

Our team of experts can perform advanced troubleshooting and even set up zaps and automations to get the job done.





 |  |  |  |

Subscribe via email
-------------------

First name

Email\*

Notification Frequency

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing is per user per month, with discounts for annual billing.

Proposify Pricing
===============

This website uses cookies that are stored in your browser. These cookies are used to collect information about how you interact with our website and allow us to remember you. We use this information in order to improve and customize your browsing experience and for analytics and metrics about our visitors both on this website and other media. To find out more about the cookies we use, see our Privacy Policy

If you decline, your information won’t be tracked when you visit this website. A single cookie will be used in your browser to remember your preference not to be tracked.

Professional Proposals for Every Budget.
========================================

Proposify offers pricing that scales with your business, from solo entrepreneurs to large enterprises. Get started today with a free trial—no credit card required.

Monthly

Annually

Up to 4 months free

### Basic

$ 29 /mo

$ 19 /mo

### Kick-start your sales

Send on-brand proposals quickly and close deals.

**Key features include:**

*   Up to 2 users
*   Content library
*   E-signatures & payments
*   Activity and metrics

[Start free trial](https://app.proposify.com/register)

$19 per user/mo, billed annually  
$29/user/mo when billed monthly

Popular

### Team

$ 49 /mo

$ 41 /mo

### Collaborate as a team

For collaborating teams integrating their tech stack.

**Everything in Basic, plus:**

*   Integrations
*   Custom URL
*   Custom fields & variables
*   Auto reminders

[Start free trial](https://app.proposify.com/register)

$41 per user/mo, billed annually  
$49/user/mo when billed quarterly

### Business

$ 65 /mo

$ 65 /mo

### Scale your sales

Growing teams looking to get consistency at scale.

**Everything in Team, plus:**

*   User roles and permissions
*   Approval workflows
*   Salesforce integration 
*   Single Sign-On (SSO)
*   Multiple workspaces
*   API access

[Book a demo](https://www-proposify-com.sandbox.hs-sites.com/demo)

$65 per user/mo, billed annually.

Compare features
----------------

### Basic

$19 per user/mo, annually  
$29/user/mo when monthly

[Start free trial](https://app.proposify.com/register)

[See all features](https://proposify.com/pricing#pricing-features-modal)

### Team

$41 per user/mo, annually  
$49/user/mo when quarterly

[Start free trial](https://app.proposify.com/register)

[See all features](https://proposify.com/pricing#pricing-features-modal)

### Business

$65 per user/mo, annually.

[Book a demo](https://www-proposify-com.sandbox.hs-sites.com/demo)

[See all features](https://proposify.com/pricing#pricing-features-modal)

Security
--------

Here at Proposify, we understand how critical it is to protect your data and documents. Our team is dedicated to keeping them safe through continuous compliance efforts, ongoing audits, and 24/7 system monitoring to ensure we meet and exceed industry standards.

            ![Image 16](https://www.proposify.com/hubfs/assets/images/badges/security/gdpr.png)

### GDPR

Proposify is committed to protecting our client’s data and privacy. That is why we maintain our GDPR compliance and enable our customers to set their own compliance preferences as a controller.

            ![Image 17](https://www.proposify.com/hubfs/assets/images/badges/security/soc2.png)

### SOC2

Proposify is SOC2 Type 2 certified to reflect our long-standing commitment to security. We have been audited against the [AICPA](https://www.aicpa.org/) Trust Services Criteria for Security, Availability, and Confidentiality.

            ![Image 18](https://www.proposify.com/hubfs/assets/images/badges/security/pcidss.png)

### PCI-DSS

Proposify uses Stripe to process payments. Stripe has been audited by a PCI-certified auditor and is certified to PCI Service Provider Level 1. This is the most rigorous level of certification available in the industry.

*   [Start free trial](https://cta-service-cms2.hubspot.com/web-interactives/public/v1/track/click?encryptedPayload=AVxigLK4gATwlfIRlfKageCAxksXgh7gqSSKn3kpn5ckKCPHROfN31I65eAeEb656rwFMne3fdLG%2BCGdidqMdz%2F0%2BNNIPoU8OqVRaiVZF1AIkFvA2SifKeCNAzdvI6nCid%2BrTuYLjLhyfxiE58DnyEOtwporQtkePboshbtOTsUZ6BuEziQu9i4%3D&portalId=5261428&webInteractiveContentId=168406268179&webInteractiveId=332438022999&containerType=EMBEDDED&pageUrl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.proposify.com%2Fpricing&pageTitle=Proposify+Pricing&referrer=&userAgent=Mozilla%2F5.0+%28Windows+NT+10.0%3B+Win64%3B+x64%29+AppleWebKit%2F537.36+%28KHTML%2C+like+Gecko%29+Chrome%2F135.0.0.0+Safari%2F537.36&hutk=ac1b957e302e18d99d09420883b126a2&hssc=63846064.1.1744714205163&hstc=63846064.ac1b957e302e18d99d09420883b126a2.1744714205163.1744714205163.1744714205163.1&pageId=167940529557&analyticsPageId=167940529557&hsfp=608284045&canonicalUrl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.proposify.com%2Fpricing&contentType=standard-page)
    
*   [Book a demo](https://cta-service-cms2.hubspot.com/web-interactives/public/v1/track/click?encryptedPayload=AVxigLKjzWGI0DYIT%2F83lktOHNmMfXjwOlZUFs3RHWXQLKCiQ1pwnMlbaVdZyRBFdupO9FZHjVYwim1djNokPqqK64fsO9XHyagCM1FtPm5ob7XLqjgvS1vnTco5FDGYu%2Fm0HiBR4pbxIZwO3BTSy5GGM8%2FA4ZAKAelybUQP3XBDlV0Rhw%3D%3D&portalId=5261428&webInteractiveContentId=168406268179&webInteractiveId=332438022999&containerType=EMBEDDED&pageUrl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.proposify.com%2Fpricing&pageTitle=Proposify+Pricing&referrer=&userAgent=Mozilla%2F5.0+%28Windows+NT+10.0%3B+Win64%3B+x64%29+AppleWebKit%2F537.36+%28KHTML%2C+like+Gecko%29+Chrome%2F135.0.0.0+Safari%2F537.36&hutk=ac1b957e302e18d99d09420883b126a2&hssc=63846064.1.1744714205163&hstc=63846064.ac1b957e302e18d99d09420883b126a2.1744714205163.1744714205163.1744714205163.1&pageId=167940529557&analyticsPageId=167940529557&hsfp=608284045&canonicalUrl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.proposify.com%2Fpricing&contentType=standard-page)
    

Our customers love us!
----------------------

            ![Image 19: G2 2025 Winter - Enterprise - Leader](https://www.proposify.com/hubfs/Leader_Enterprise_Leader.png)

            ![Image 20: G2 2024 - Top 50 Sales Product Badge](https://www.proposify.com/hubfs/b3a17ecad0430be803e5211fa8dedb07.png)

            ![Image 21: G2 2025 Winter - Mid-Market - Leader](https://www.proposify.com/hubfs/Leader_Mid-Market_Leader.png)

Close more deals, even while you are asleep with Proposify

I love that we are alerted when the prospect interacts with the quote. We get to see how long they have viewed the quote, which page they are currently viewing, if they have clicked on any elements and also a nice E-mail alert when they first open the quote and if they have successfully accepted the quote. We have closed hundreds of sales outside of business hours because of the simplicity for the customer to edit their quote, accept it and then pay for it immediately.

  ![Image 22:  Craig M.](https://www.proposify.com/hubfs/Testimonials/craig.webp)

Craig M. Chief Operating Officer

Ridiculously Useful Proposal Builder

It's simple to create a new proposal from a template and customize it as necessary. Proposals look beautiful from the client's perspective, and they are more effective than any of the other solutions I've tried. I have been using it for a few years now and would not consider using anuything else. We can produce proposals that used to takes us 2 hours in about 15 minutes. And they close at a higher rate.

Frequently asked questions
--------------------------

Have another question not mentioned here? Chat with us below.

Can I cancel my account?

Absolutely! You can cancel your account at any point during your billing cycle to prevent future renewals. Rest assured, you'll continue to enjoy access to all of Proposify's features until the end of your current subscription period. Please note that we do not offer refunds once the payment has been processed.

How do I get access to additional features and services?

You can upgrade your plan at any time to access additional features.

If you are interested in the premium features and services listed on our Business plan, [please get in touch](https://proposify.com/demo), and we can set up the right plan for you.

What is included in the free trial?

Our free trial gives you access to all of the features on our [Team plan](https://proposify.com/pricing) for 14 days. We recommend taking things for a spin to see which ones work best for your team and process. You can create and send real proposals to real clients during your trial. Once your trial is over, your clients can still view and accept any proposals you sent to them during the trial period.

What happens when I am at my send limit?

Some of our plans limit how many documents you can send each month.

Once you are at your send limit you can send an additional document for a low one-time fee per send.

The amount of sends will roll over each month so they will accumulate if you don't use them.

How many contacts can I have?

All plans include unlimited contacts. You can import your contacts directly via one of our CRM integrations.

We need to get our documents set up quickly and need a fresh take on the design. Does Proposify offer support?

We certainly do! If you are looking to elevate your deal design and get a more customized look and feel, we are here to help. We have a team of talented and experienced designers in-house to support our customers and ensure they are set up for success. They know proposals and how to make your documents shine through design and work for your unique sales process. Check out our [Professional Services](https://www.proposify.com/professional-services) page for more information and let us transform your proposals so you can be ready to impress.

You don't have a template specific to my industry. Can I create one or can Proposify design one for me?

Absolutely! While we have an extensive [proposal template](https://www.proposify.com/proposal-templates) library for most projects and industries, all our templates are 100% customizable. This means you can create and update the content to match your brand and style guidelines. You can also paste text from other programs like Google Docs and Word for an easy transition.

However, if you have a specific template you are currently using and don’t have the time to get things set up, our team of in-house designers can help. Check out our [Professional Services page](https://proposify.com/platform/professional-design-services) for more information.

What are your support hours?

Our team is here to provide their fabulous support Monday - Thursday 8 AM - 8 PM EST and on Fridays 8 AM - 4 PM EST.

Will my proposal data be safe?

Keeping your data safe is a priority. We are dedicated to doing this through continued compliance efforts, ongoing audits, and 24/7 system monitoring to ensure we meet and exceed industry standards. Proposals are sent using secure encrypted links and we never disclose your information to third parties. We partner with Amazon for cloud hosting and your data is protected by 256-bit SSL security. We are also GDPR and SOC2 compliant. Learn more on our [Security](https://www.proposify.com/security) page.

What if my prospects don't speak English?

You can translate our interface into 15 languages to make it easier for your non-English speaking clients. However, we do not translate the content of your proposals or the emails sent through Proposify so you will need to make those adjustments.
